description:
I've got this installed on a Mac, a win10 workstation, My Linux WS, and I access everything from my iPad - sometimes from hundreds of miles away. I even have an installed on my 92 year old dad's Win10 WS, so I can provide him with some support when he needs it. Never had a problem wit it anywhere.

I also administer a paid version of this on multiple NUCs spread over a couple of campuses without a hiccup.

Only issue is ensuring that it's up to date (6.7.1 is current) here in Linux. The personal version is one of the best free things you can get.
do not work, maybe due to old veiwer.
Works perfectly! No problems at all, except the version... Please update to the latest version!
It does not work on Ubuntu 19.10. I do not see new open port after start VNC server.
Wenn kein Benutzer eingeloggt ist, funktioniert es nicht. Somit unbrauchbar (Home Abonnement). Oder ich habe es nicht geschafft...

Grace à VNC on peut se brancher à distance sur n'importe quel ordinateur PRECEDEMENT enregistré, par la propriétaire de celui, dans votre Team' et ainsi on peut prendre la main pour dépanner, ... Parfait
